query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Intra due cibi, distanti e moventi 2 d’un modo, prima si morria di fame, 3 che liber’ omo l’un recasse ai denti;
4 sì si starebbe un agno intra due brame 5 di fieri lupi, igualmente temendo; 6 sì si starebbe un cane intra due dame:
7 per che, s’i’ mi tacea, me non riprendo, 8 da li miei dubbi d’un modo sospinto, 9 poi ch’era necessario, né commendo.
query.result:
**English:**
1 Between two foods, distant and moving 2 in the same way, one would die of hunger first, 3 before a free man would bring one of them to his teeth;
4 thus one would stand for a year between two cravings 5 of fierce wolves, fearing them equally; 6 thus one would stand, a dog between two does:
7 because, if I kept silent, I would not blame myself, 8 driven in one direction by my doubts, 9 since it was necessary, nor do I praise myself.
**Malay:**
1 Di antara dua makanan, jauh dan bergerak 2 dengan cara yang sama, seseorang akan mati kelaparan terlebih dahulu, 3 sebelum orang bebas membawanya ke giginya;
4 demikianlah seseorang akan berdiri selama setahun di antara dua keinginan 5 serigala yang ganas, sama-sama takut; 6 demikianlah seekor anjing akan berdiri di antara dua rusa betina:
7 karena, jika aku diam, aku tidak akan menyalahkan diriku sendiri, 8 didorong ke satu arah oleh keraguanku, 9 karena itu perlu, aku juga tidak memuji diriku sendiri.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Io mi tacea, ma ’l mio disir dipinto 11 m’era nel viso, e ’l dimandar con ello, 12 più caldo assai che per parlar distinto.
query.result:
**English:**
10 I was silent, but my desire was painted 11 on my face, and he asked me with it, 12 more fervently than by distinct speech.
**Malay:**
10 Aku terdiam, tetapi hasratku terlukis 11 di wajahku, dan dia bertanya kepadaku dengan itu, 12 lebih bersemangat daripada berbicara dengan jelas.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Tu argomenti: “Se ’l buon voler dura, 20 la vïolenza altrui per qual ragione 21 di meritar mi scema la misura?”.
query.result:
**English:**
19 You argue: “If good will endures, 20 why should the violence of others 21 diminish the measure of my merit?”.
**Malay:**
19 Kamu berpendapat: “Jika niat baik bertahan, 20 mengapa kekerasan orang lain 21 mengurangi ukuran pahalaku?”.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 Ancor di dubitar ti dà cagione 23 parer tornarsi l’anime a le stelle, 24 secondo la sentenza di Platone.
query.result:
**English:**
22 Even to doubt gives you cause 23 to think that souls return to the stars, 24 according to Plato's judgment.
**Malay:**
22 Bahkan untuk meragukan memberi Anda alasan 23 untuk berpikir bahwa jiwa-jiwa kembali ke bintang-bintang, 24 menurut penilaian Plato.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Queste son le question che nel tuo velle 26 pontano igualmente; e però pria 27 tratterò quella che più ha di felle.
query.result:
**English:**
25 These are the questions that in your will 26 point equally; and therefore first 27 I will treat the one that has more gall.
**Malay:**
25 Inilah pertanyaan-pertanyaan yang dalam keinginanmu 26 sama-sama penting; dan karena itu pertama-tama 27 akan kubahas yang paling pahit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 D’i Serafin colui che più s’india, 29 Moïsè, Samuel, e quel Giovanni 30 che prender vuoli, io dico, non Maria,
31 non hanno in altro cielo i loro scanni 32 che questi spirti che mo t’appariro, 33 né hanno a l’esser lor più o meno anni;
34 ma tutti fanno bello il primo giro, 35 e differentemente han dolce vita 36 per sentir più e men l’etterno spiro.
query.result:
**English:**
28 Of the Seraphim, the one who soars highest, 29 Moses, Samuel, and that John 30 whom you wish to take, I say, not Mary,
31 have their seats in no other heaven 32 than these spirits who have just appeared to you, 33 nor do they have more or fewer years in their existence;
34 but all of them beautify the first circle, 35 and they have a sweet life in different ways, 36 because they feel more or less of the eternal breath.
**Malay:**
28 Dari para Serafim, yang paling tinggi kedudukannya, 29 Musa, Samuel, dan Yohanes itu 30 yang ingin kau ambil, kukatakan, bukan Maria,
31 tidak memiliki tempat duduk mereka di surga lain 32 selain roh-roh ini yang baru saja menampakkan diri kepadamu, 33 dan mereka tidak memiliki lebih banyak atau lebih sedikit tahun dalam keberadaan mereka;
34 tetapi semuanya memperindah lingkaran pertama, 35 dan mereka memiliki kehidupan yang manis dengan cara yang berbeda, 36 karena mereka merasakan lebih atau kurang nafas abadi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 Qui si mostraro, non perché sortita 38 sia questa spera lor, ma per far segno 39 de la celestïal c’ha men salita.
query.result:
**English:**
37 Here they showed themselves, not because this sphere is their exit, 38 but to make a sign of the celestial sphere that leads upward.
**Malay:**
37 Di sini mereka menunjukkan diri, bukan karena bola ini adalah jalan keluar mereka, 38 tetapi untuk membuat tanda dari bola langit yang menuntun ke atas.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Così parlar conviensi al vostro ingegno, 41 però che solo da sensato apprende 42 ciò che fa poscia d’intelletto degno.
query.result:
**English:**
40 Thus it is fitting to speak to your intellect, 41 because only from a wise person does one learn 42 that which later makes one worthy of understanding.
**Malay:**
40 Begitulah seharusnya berbicara kepada intelek Anda, 41 karena hanya dari orang bijak seseorang belajar 42 apa yang kemudian membuatnya layak untuk dipahami.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 Quel che Timeo de l’anime argomenta 50 non è simile a ciò che qui si vede, 51 però che, come dice, par che senta.
query.result:
**English:**
49 What Timaeus argues about the soul 50 is not similar to what is seen here, 51 but, as he says, it seems that it feels.
**Malay:**
49 Apa yang Timaeus perdebatkan tentang jiwa 50 tidak sama dengan apa yang terlihat di sini, 51 tetapi, seperti yang dikatakannya, tampaknya ia merasakan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 S’elli intende tornare a queste ruote 59 l’onor de la influenza e ’l biasmo, forse 60 in alcun vero suo arco percuote.
query.result:
**English:**
58 If he intends to return to these wheels, 59 the honor of the influence and the blame, perhaps, 60 he strikes in some true arc of his.
**Malay:**
58 Jika dia berniat untuk kembali ke roda-roda ini, 59 kehormatan pengaruh dan celaan, mungkin, 60 dia menyerang dalam beberapa lengkungan kebenarannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 Questo principio, male inteso, torse 62 già tutto il mondo quasi, sì che Giove, 63 Mercurio e Marte a nominar trascorse.
query.result:
**English:**
61 This principle, misunderstood, twisted 62 almost the whole world already, so that Jove, 63 Mercury, and Mars it led astray to name.
**Malay:**
61 Prinsip ini, yang disalahpahami, telah memutarbalikkan 62 hampir seluruh dunia, sehingga Yupiter, 63 Merkurius, dan Mars disesatkan untuk menyebut nama.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 L’altra dubitazion che ti commove 65 ha men velen, però che sua malizia 66 non ti poria menar da me altrove.
query.result:
**English:**
64 The other doubt that troubles you 65 has more venom, but its malice 66 could not lead you elsewhere away from me.
**Malay:**
64 Keraguan lainnya yang mengganggumu 65 memiliki lebih banyak bisa, tetapi kejahatannya 66 tidak dapat membawamu ke tempat lain yang jauh dariku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 Parere ingiusta la nostra giustizia 68 ne li occhi d’i mortali, è argomento 69 di fede e non d’eretica nequizia.
query.result:
**English:**
67 Our justice seems unjust 68 in the eyes of mortals, it is a matter 69 of faith and not of heretical wickedness.
**Malay:**
67 Keadilan kita tampak tidak adil 68 di mata manusia, itu adalah masalah 69 keimanan dan bukan kejahatan sesat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Ma perché puote vostro accorgimento 71 ben penetrare a questa veritate, 72 come disiri, ti farò contento.
query.result:
**English:**
70 But because your discernment can 71 well penetrate to this truth, 72 as you desire, I will satisfy you.
**Malay:**
70 Tetapi karena pertimbangan Anda dapat 71 menembus kebenaran ini dengan baik, 72 seperti yang Anda inginkan, saya akan memuaskan Anda.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Se vïolenza è quando quel che pate 74 nïente conferisce a quel che sforza, 75 non fuor quest’ alme per essa scusate:
76 ché volontà, se non vuol, non s’ammorza, 77 ma fa come natura face in foco, 78 se mille volte vïolenza il torza.
query.result:
**English:**
73 If violence is when that which suffers 74 gives nothing to that which exerts force, 75 then these souls are not excused by it:
76 because the will, if it does not want, is not quenched, 77 but does as nature does in fire, 78 if violence twists it a thousand times.
**Malay:**
73 Jika kekerasan adalah ketika yang menderita 74 tidak memberikan apa pun kepada yang memaksa, 75 maka jiwa-jiwa ini tidak dimaafkan olehnya:
76 karena keinginan, jika tidak menginginkan, tidak padam, 77 tetapi melakukan seperti yang dilakukan alam dalam api, 78 jika kekerasan memutarnya seribu kali.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 Per che, s’ella si piega assai o poco, 80 segue la forza; e così queste fero 81 possendo rifuggir nel santo loco.
query.result:
**English:**
79 Therefore, if she bends a little or a lot, 80 she follows the force; and so these wild beasts 81 were able to flee into the holy place.
**Malay:**
79 Oleh karena itu, jika dia membungkuk sedikit atau banyak, 80 dia mengikuti kekuatan; dan begitulah binatang-binatang buas ini 81 dapat melarikan diri ke tempat suci.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 Se fosse stato lor volere intero, 83 come tenne Lorenzo in su la grada, 84 e fece Muzio a la sua man severo,
85 così l’avria ripinte per la strada 86 ond’ eran tratte, come fuoro sciolte; 87 ma così salda voglia è troppo rada.
query.result:
**English:**
82 If their will had been whole, 83 as Lorenzo held them on the steps, 84 and Mucius was severe to his own hand,
85 thus he would have driven them back along the road 86 from which they had been dragged, as soon as they were released; 87 but such steadfast will is too rare.
**Malay:**
82 Jika keinginan mereka bulat, 83 seperti Lorenzo menahan mereka di tangga, 84 dan Mucius bersikap keras terhadap tangannya sendiri,
85 maka ia akan mendorong mereka kembali ke jalan 86 dari mana mereka telah diseret, segera setelah mereka dilepaskan; 87 tetapi keinginan yang begitu kuat sangatlah jarang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 E per queste parole, se ricolte 89 l’hai come dei, è l’argomento casso 90 che t’avria fatto noia ancor più volte.
query.result:
**English:**
88 And for these words, if you have gathered them 89 as from a god, the argument is void 90 that would have troubled you even more times.
**Malay:**
88 Dan untuk kata-kata ini, jika kamu telah mengumpulkannya 89 sebagai sesuatu dari Tuhan, argumen itu batal 90 yang akan menyusahkanmu berkali-kali lagi.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Ma or ti s’attraversa un altro passo 92 dinanzi a li occhi, tal che per te stesso 93 non usciresti: pria saresti lasso.
query.result:
**English:**
91 But now another pass confronts you 92 before your eyes, such that by yourself 93 you would not emerge: you would first grow weary.
**Malay:**
91 Tetapi sekarang lintasan lain melintang 92 di hadapan matamu, sedemikian rupa sehingga dengan usahamu sendiri 93 kamu tidak akan dapat keluar: kamu akan lebih dulu lelah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 A questo punto voglio che tu pense 107 che la forza al voler si mischia, e fanno 108 sì che scusar non si posson l’offense.
query.result:
**English:**
106 At this point I want you to consider 107 that force is mixed with the will, and they make it 108 so that offenses cannot be excused.
**Malay:**
106 Pada titik ini aku ingin kamu mempertimbangkan 107 bahwa kekuatan bercampur dengan keinginan, dan mereka membuatnya 108 sehingga pelanggaran tidak dapat dimaafkan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 Voglia assoluta non consente al danno; 110 ma consentevi in tanto in quanto teme, 111 se si ritrae, cadere in più affanno.
query.result:
**English:**
109 Absolute desire does not consent to harm; 110 but it consents to it insofar as it fears, 111 if it draws back, falling into greater suffering.
**Malay:**
109 Keinginan mutlak tidak mengizinkan kerugian; 110 tetapi mengizinkannya sejauh ia takut, 111 jika ia menarik diri, jatuh ke dalam penderitaan yang lebih besar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 Però, quando Piccarda quello spreme, 113 de la voglia assoluta intende, e io 114 de l’altra; sì che ver diciamo insieme».
query.result:
**English:**
112 But when Piccarda squeezes that out, 113 she means the absolute will, and I 114 the other; so that we both speak truly.
**Malay:**
112 Tetapi, ketika Piccarda memeras itu, 113 dia maksudkan keinginan yang mutlak, dan aku 114 maksudkan yang lain; sehingga kita berdua berbicara benar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 Cotal fu l’ondeggiar del santo rio 116 ch’uscì del fonte ond’ ogne ver deriva; 117 tal puose in pace uno e altro disio.
query.result:
**English:**
115 Such was the rippling of the holy river 116 that issued from the source from which every truth flows; 117 thus it brought peace to one desire and the other.
**Malay:**
115 Begitulah riaknya sungai suci 116 yang keluar dari mata air yang darinya mengalir setiap kebenaran; 117 demikianlah ia mendamaikan satu keinginan dan keinginan lainnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 «O amanza del primo amante, o diva», 119 diss’ io appresso, «il cui parlar m’inonda 120 e scalda sì, che più e più m’avviva,
121 non è l’affezion mia tanto profonda, 122 che basti a render voi grazia per grazia; 123 ma quei che vede e puote a ciò risponda.
query.result:
**English:**
118 "O mistress of the first lover, O goddess," 119 I said next, "whose speech floods me 120 and warms me so that it enlivens me more and more,
121 my affection is not so profound 122 that it suffices to render you grace for grace; 123 but may He who sees and can do so respond to this."
**Malay:**
118 "Wahai kekasih kekasih pertama, wahai dewi," 119 kataku kemudian, "yang ucapannya membanjiriku 120 dan menghangatkanku sehingga semakin menghidupkanku,
121 kasih sayangku tidaklah sedalam itu 122 sehingga cukup untuk membalasimu kebaikan dengan kebaikan; 123 tetapi semoga Dia yang melihat dan mampu melakukannya menjawab ini."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Io veggio ben che già mai non si sazia 125 nostro intelletto, se ’l ver non lo illustra 126 di fuor dal qual nessun vero si spazia.
query.result:
**English:**
124 I see well that our intellect is never satisfied 125 unless the truth enlightens it, 126 outside of which no true knowledge can be found.
**Malay:**
124 Aku melihat dengan jelas bahwa intelek kita tidak pernah puas 125 kecuali kebenaran meneranginya, 126 di luar kebenaran itu tidak ada pengetahuan sejati yang dapat ditemukan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 Posasi in esso, come fera in lustra, 128 tosto che giunto l’ha; e giugner puollo: 129 se non, ciascun disio sarebbe frustra.
query.result:
**English:**
127 He places himself in it, like a wild beast in its lair, 128 as soon as he has arrived there; and he can arrive there: 129 if not, every desire would be frustrated.
**Malay:**
127 Dia meletakkan dirinya di dalamnya, seperti binatang buas di sarangnya, 128 segera setelah dia sampai di sana; dan dia bisa sampai di sana: 129 jika tidak, setiap keinginan akan sia-sia.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Nasce per quello, a guisa di rampollo, 131 a piè del vero il dubbio; ed è natura 132 ch’al sommo pinge noi di collo in collo.
query.result:
**English:**
130 Doubt is born from that, like a new shoot, 131 at the foot of truth; and it is nature's way 132 that it leads us to the summit, step by step.
**Malay:**
130 Keraguan lahir dari itu, seperti tunas baru, 131 di kaki kebenaran; dan itu adalah cara alam 132 yang menuntun kita ke puncak, selangkah demi selangkah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 Questo m’invita, questo m’assicura 134 con reverenza, donna, a dimandarvi 135 d’un’altra verità che m’è oscura.
query.result:
**English:**
133 This invites me, this assures me 134 with reverence, lady, to ask you 135 about another truth that is obscure to me.
**Malay:**
133 Ini mengundangku, ini meyakinkanku 134 dengan hormat, nona, untuk menanyakanmu 135 tentang kebenaran lain yang tidak jelas bagiku.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
136 Io vo’ saper se l’uom può sodisfarvi 137 ai voti manchi sì con altri beni, 138 ch’a la vostra statera non sien parvi».
query.result:
**English:**
136 I want to know if a man can satisfy you 137 with other goods for the vows you lack, 138 that may not seem small on your scale.
**Malay:**
136 Aku ingin tahu apakah seorang lelaki dapat memuaskan kalian 137 dengan barang-barang lain untuk sumpah yang tidak terpenuhi, 138 yang mungkin tidak tampak kecil pada timbangan kalian.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
139 Beatrice mi guardò con li occhi pieni 140 di faville d’amor così divini, 141 che, vinta, mia virtute diè le reni,
142 e quasi mi perdei con li occhi chini.
query.result:
**English:**
139 Beatrice looked at me with her eyes full 140 of such divine sparks of love, 141 that, vanquished, my virtue turned its back,
142 and I almost lost myself with my eyes downcast.
**Malay:**
139 Beatrice menatapku dengan matanya yang penuh 140 dengan percikan cinta yang begitu ilahi, 141 sehingga, takluk, kebajikan-kebajikanku menyerah,
142 dan aku hampir kehilangan diriku dengan mata tertunduk.
